column1: Question
While playing a fun game on the Internet, you get a pop-up message. The message reads “Click here now to win a brand new iPhone!!!” What would you do?
column4: Open the link in a new tab

column1: Which of the following is a safe way to use social media?

column5: Use the same password for all your social media accounts

column1: Which of the following is a safe way to share personal information online?
column2: Only share your personal information with trusted individuals
column3: Post your phone number on social media
column4: Share your password with your friends
column5: Post your home address on your blog

column1: If you are 12 years old and want to use a website/app with a minimum age of 13, you should:
column2: Not use the site until you are 13
column3: Lie about your birthday, 12 is close enough
column4: Use your friends account who is 13

column1: What should you do if you receive an email from an unknown sender asking for personal information?
column4: Provide the information in the email
column5: Forward the email to your friends

column1: Why is it important to have a strong password?
column2: So that your accounts and information are protected
column3: So that you can remember it easily

column1: What is cyber Security
What is online privacy
column2: Keeping our personal information safe and private when we use the Internet
column3: Sharing our personal information with everyone we meet
column4: Posting our personal information online for everyone to see

column1: What is a computer virus
column2: A type of Software that harms our device
column3: A type of animal that lives in the ocean
column4: A type of food that we eat for breakfast

column1: What is cyberbullying?
column2: When someone uses the internet to say mean or hurtful things to another person
column3: When someone gives us a compliment online
column4: When we share our favorite hobby online

column1: What is phishing?
column2: A type of social engineering attack that attempts to trick individuals into providing sensitive information
column3: A type of fish that lives in the ocean
column4: A type of game you can play online with your friends

column1: What is a password?
column2: A secret word that you use to protect your computer or device
column3: A type of food that you eat for breakfast
column4: A type of toy that you play with outside

column1: What should you do if you receive an email or message from someone you don't know?
column2: Ignore the message and delete it
column3: Reply to the message and tell them your name and where you live
column4: Reply to the message and ask them to be your friend

column1: Who should you accept friend or chat requests from online?

column2: Ask an adult if the link is safe

column1: What should you do if a stranger asks you to send a picture of yourself to them?
column2: Do not send it and tell an adult
column4: Send the photo to the stranger

column1: You get a new email that says you won a money and to click a link to claimit” Would you open it?

column3: Give them all the information they want
